metadata.Title: CVE-2010-4300

Platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise Desktop 10 SP3 for AMD64 and Intel EM64T
SUSE Linux Enterprise Desktop 10 SP3 for x86
SUSE Linux Enterprise Desktop 10 SP4 for AMD64 and Intel EM64T
SUSE Linux Enterprise Desktop 10 SP4 for x86

metadata.Description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the dissect_ldss_transfer function (epan/dissectors/packet-ldss.c) in the LDSS dissector in Wireshark 1.2.0 through 1.2.12 and 1.4.0 through 1.4.1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) and possibly execute arbitrary code via an LDSS packet with a long digest line that triggers memory corruption.
